channel.title: Kethsi 2 - RuneScape Remake
channel.description:
[CENTER]Greetings [B]MoparScape[/B],
[img]http://www.kethsi.com/kethsi2-logo.png[/img]
[I]Welcome to Kethsi 2 (Open Beta Stage)[/I]
Kethsi 2 is yet, another little remake, touched up with some unique features, taking away that vanilla feeling from RuneScape Private Servers. You don't just log in, type ::commands, get your levels up within a week then get bored and quit. We have real achievements here, and real hero's as well!
If you feel like doing a real challenge, then you should consider Kethsi 2 in your challenge list.
[B]Information about the server:[/B]
Kethsi 2 is a RuneScape remake, as I have said, in every aspect (even the XP Rates), except for the membership. On Kethsi 2, you don't need to be a member in order to access skills, or areas, our membership plans gives the member's a lot of benefits, but we do not restrict main game features to members. Pretty much you only became a Member if you want to. Kethsi 2 also has quests, and we're working on new quests every week. In order to maximize the memories feeling of the good old pre-eoc RuneScape, which was turned into EoC in 2012.
Most people would rather consider 2007 (Oldschool RuneScape) over a RuneScape Private Server with X1 XP Rates, but not everyone thinks that way. Some people actually likes making money with their Yaks on Frost Dragons, or doing a Bandos Trip with their Overloads and Saradomin Brews. That kind of content is not possible on the live RuneScape Server (even with Legacy Mode!).
So if you ask me "Why would I put so many time and effort on a RSPS?"
- Well, you're not only supposed to be maxed combat to have fun on a game. We do offer a lot of low level content, and if you're worrying about players interaction, don't worry, a lot of people will be the same level as you, with the same bank and same equipments. It's not like you will be the only level 45 around.
[B]That being said, I think everyone has their own opinions, so please forget the comments of "That's just stupid" about the XP rates, don't like it, alright, I respect your opinion.[/B]
[B]Let's move to the server media and features![/B]
[B]Features:[/B]
Full World Integration (2 Worlds, 1 being Free to Play, 1 being Members) Grand Exchange (Worlds Integration Support) Clan Chats A lot of Minigames, as Pest Control, Soul Wars, Fight Pits... Quests! Yes, we have about 7 quests ready just for the beta season! Player-Owned Houses Real RuneScape Farming Abyss (Miniquest required) Full Hunter All Potions (incluiding Barbarian Mixes!) Old Items Look Support (with money pouch and toolbelt) Almost all types of teleports (Spirit Tree, Dramen Staff, Fairy Rings, All Jewelry) Better Combat Handling FULL Runecrafting (Even Combining Runes)
[B]That's just the last things I have worked in that I can remember of. We have a lot of small features from Making Pizza to Filling a Vial. From Adding Butter to your Potato to Milking a cow.[/B]
[SIZE=5][B]Links:[/B]
- [URL=http://www.kethsi.com]Website[/URL] - [URL=http://www.kethsi.com/forums]Forums[/URL] - [URL=http://www.kethsi.com/register.php]Create a free account[/URL][/SIZE]
[I]Note; Forums are not linked to game accounts![/I]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/a25b11846efddbe6110db91807507349.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/fe485cee1a05e742c3410c8915586758.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/8d711bce2d56cf5a1ea1fb8454d81073.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/9f00c76cc0350613600c7d0d0034155f.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/18552f412c3f21a88e1cfbb1805828b6.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/deb7b946b9ad0f0a328e293af090a940.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/7b015a8ea712548469969fe0993cc326.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/02ae37865fa722d341fbadbe707cfaa6.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/751573a0b0ca7e46e3a3106360b6568c.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/279580cbe40d386a61ce52a069810843.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/6a2649e7338f5636d753af4f8e6c104c.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/133f0a6e5ac61470717c65c37b18dd7c.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/32fb0b6ca0157f526d8e65913bed2afa.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/baee35b8641325296ad21fb2208da1da.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/ff3e1412f77e89e768b58f4106842468.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/8c99fad751585d9dcada30e3a9e21a99.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/838a3ea59efab497d1e478ee36e956a3.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/dcb51a6bea5d4ce18b2449dd2dfb4e19.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/afac44ccd1b8d4467f1c3637ea2bb420.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/151aaefa33fe6f1c80b1e95229d9deaf.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/0b56c137da56d9de578dc2d6ca9ee625.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/806663f25e45b877d41035369ef99b4b.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/e28ce3b654ee138c0d5857f90726a27c.png[/img]

item.title: Kethsi 2 - RuneScape Remake
item.dc:creator: @Kethsi Kethsi
item.description:
@Kethsi wrote:

Greetings,

• Fixed a small floor items glitch
• Fixed House Teleport (inside your house)
• Fixed House Chapel Burners
• Fixed a few NPCs bonuses (the ones that were reported)
• You can now make soft clay.
• You can now cook & eat Sweetcorn.

01/26/2015

Greetings,

• Big Bones has been removed from Skeleton's drop table.
• Crashed Stars has been fixed.
• Your Gravestones should save upon log out.
• Big net/harpoon fishing spots should require 76 fishing and they should only give Sharks now.
• Fixed Katana's item stats
• A little farming glitch was fixed.
• Players can now access the Crafting Guild.
• You can now fire Broad-tipped bolts
• You can now craft Broad-tipped bolts (require Slayer Ability)
• XP Lamps XP rate is now X3 aswell.

Greetings,

• Fixed GWD Spawns
• Fixed Metal Dragons Fire breath
• Fixed Kalphite lair.

Read full topic

item.title: Kethsi 2 - RuneScape Remake
item.dc:creator: @Kethsi Kethsi
item.description:
@Kethsi wrote:

Motekiku:

Looks really well made, by the way the links are broken.

Fixed the links.

Not used to smf forums.

Greetings,

I have set the XP rate to x3.

Everyone’s XP was multiplied by 3.

(Except for levels under 5, and hitpoints if you had 10 hitpoints)

Read full topic

item.title: Kethsi 2 - RuneScape Remake
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Looks fine, I’ve not kept up with the whole section of this revision. I remember when there was like no way possible of having skillcapes, this was like a trend so in this case, I’m not sure what the trend is and what’s supposed to be already there (as some people might point it).

Anyway, the advertisement looks fine from the looks of it. Good luck with the server, I wish for the best.

Read full topic

item.title: Kethsi 2 - RuneScape Remake
item.dc:creator: @Kethsi Kethsi
item.description:
@Kethsi wrote:

Greetings,

Small Updates today.

• On your first login, you should be able to choose your characters look, like RuneScape did in 2012.
• You should spawn in Lumbridge instead.
• The “Starter step” was removed.
• Added Voting

Read full topic

item.title: Kethsi 2 - RuneScape Remake
item.dc:creator: @Kethsi Kethsi
item.description:
@Kethsi wrote:

[CENTER]Greetings [B]MoparScape[/B],

[I]Welcome to Kethsi 2 (Open Beta Stage)[/I]

Kethsi 2 is yet, another little remake, touched up with some unique features, taking away that vanilla feeling from RuneScape Private Servers. You don’t just log in, type ::commands, get your levels up within a week then get bored and quit. We have real achievements here, and real hero’s as well!

If you feel like doing a real challenge, then you should consider Kethsi 2 in your challenge list.

[B]Information about the server:[/B]

Kethsi 2 is a RuneScape remake, as I have said, in every aspect (even the XP Rates), except for the membership. On Kethsi 2, you don’t need to be a member in order to access skills, or areas, our membership plans gives the member’s a lot of benefits, but we do not restrict main game features to members. Pretty much you only became a Member if you want to. Kethsi 2 also has quests, and we’re working on new quests every week. In order to maximize the memories feeling of the good old pre-eoc RuneScape, which was turned into EoC in 2012.

Most people would rather consider 2007 (Oldschool RuneScape) over a RuneScape Private Server with X1 XP Rates, but not everyone thinks that way. Some people actually likes making money with their Yaks on Frost Dragons, or doing a Bandos Trip with their Overloads and Saradomin Brews. That kind of content is not possible on the live RuneScape Server (even with Legacy Mode!).

So if you ask me “Why would I put so many time and effort on a RSPS?”

  • Well, you’re not only supposed to be maxed combat to have fun on a game. We do offer a lot of low level content, and if you’re worrying about players interaction, don’t worry, a lot of people will be the same level as you, with the same bank and same equipments. It’s not like you will be the only level 45 around.

[B]That being said, I think everyone has their own opinions, so please forget the comments of “That’s just stupid” about the XP rates, don’t like it, alright, I respect your opinion.[/B]

[B]Let’s move to the server media and features![/B]

[B]Features:[/B]

Full World Integration (2 Worlds, 1 being Free to Play, 1 being Members)
Grand Exchange (Worlds Integration Support)
Clan Chats
A lot of Minigames, as Pest Control, Soul Wars, Fight Pits…
Quests! Yes, we have about 7 quests ready just for the beta season!
Player-Owned Houses
Real RuneScape Farming
Abyss (Miniquest required)
Full Hunter
All Potions (incluiding Barbarian Mixes!)
Old Items Look Support (with money pouch and toolbelt)
Almost all types of teleports (Spirit Tree, Dramen Staff, Fairy Rings, All Jewelry)
Better Combat Handling
FULL Runecrafting (Even Combining Runes)

[B]That’s just the last things I have worked in that I can remember of. We have a lot of small features from Making Pizza to Filling a Vial. From Adding Butter to your Potato to Milking a cow.[/B]
